response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is truly exceptional and holds significant value for someone like yourself. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This offer represents a unique chance to secure an asset that could potentially be worth even more to you than its current market value of $800,000. I am confident that you will find the product to be an invaluable addition to your collection or business, and I look forward to the possibility of working with you. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
